price: او ای قومه! څه خبره ده چې زه مو د خلاصون لور ته بولم او تاسو مې اور ته بولئ؟
arabic: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi mā lī adʿūkum ilā al-najati watadʿūnanī ilā al-nāri
